summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the transfer of assets related to Jeffrey Epstein. It discusses the logistics of transferring securities and includes communication between various individuals involved in the transaction. The email highlights issues with counterparty instructions and confirms the market value of the assets being transferred.

events.title: Asset Transfer Communication
events.description: Communication regarding the transfer of assets related to Jeffrey Epstein, including issues with counterparty instructions.

keyFacts: The document discusses the transfer of $1,616,000 worth of securities related to Jeffrey Epstein.
There were issues with counterparty instructions that delayed the asset transfer.
The assets being transferred are held by Euroclear and involve a significant market value.
